content.html: Do you think code coverage numbers are useless? Well, not if you use cover coverage reports to find missing test scenarios. @mauricioaniche explains how coverage reports can help you step up in your testing game. Full episode: software-engineering-unlocked.com/tests-find-bug…
content.value:
Do you think code coverage numbers are useless?

Well, not if you use cover coverage reports to find missing test scenarios. @mauricioaniche explains how coverage reports can help you step up in your testing game.

Full episode: software-engineering-unlocked.com/tests-find-bug…
